Author: edu

Off-topic rant: why the hell the article is divided in pages? Six of them! This is the WEB. W.E.B. Not a paper magazine. Argh.

Sorry, this kind of things really annoy me. Proceed to downvote ;)

Author: sadiq
Content: Take a look at the specs of the OLPC. It copes with pretty extreme conditions. Heat, moisture, accidental damage, lack of clean power. The screen is readable in African sunlight. I'd place a pretty decent wager you'd be hard pushed to find a $100 laptop on Ebay that'd exceed the life expectancy and usefulness of an XO.
